name: The Handbook (itch)
description:
Traverse a dark surreal landscape; explore the conflict between one's own body and the world around them; and navigate emotional instability that appears in the form of unpredictable, randomized events--all determined by a roll of the dice

Controls: 

Movement: Right/Left arrow keys 
Jump/Wall Jump: Z 
Dash: C 
Interact: Up/Down arrow keys

Credits

Engineer: Luai Salah
Storywriter: Exots
Music and sound: Driann
Art: wandermel
Art: Space Nerd

DEVELOPMENT NOTE: The player starts at the wrong place, starts at the end of the game
